name: Anno 2205
summary:
Anno 2205™ – The beloved city-builder game takes off into space!
Raise your city, develop your resources, and race to space! Anno’s masterful economic gameplay is back, taking strategic city-building simulation to new heights in the biggest Anno ever. Secure the prosperity of your people by controlling multiple locations on Earth and on the moon.
info:
• 中文名: 纪元 2205
  • 开发: Ubisoft Entertainment
  • 发行: Ubisoft Entertainment
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 模拟经营
  • 发行日期: 2015-11-03
